authors: Brent Mcdonald Emily B. Hager Nadia Sussman
description: Steve Jobs' legacy as a technology visionary; how he revolutionized many media industries but struggled to transform television; and the benefits of accessible technology to the physically challenged.
title: TimesCast | October 6, 2011
text: Steve Jobs' legacy as a technology visionary; how he revolutionized many media industries but struggled to transform television; and the benefits of accessible technology to the physically challenged.
